Summary: very bright light sphere movein slow then it gos in to light speed !!!!!!
divs: Sighting DetailsWell me and my girl friend was out side bout 11:30 and she saw a bright light the we both looked it was moving so slow the like 10mins past then it like went so fast like it hit light speed and it left a mark in the dark sky now every other night it comes back to the same place center of the sky were we live
